timeline.message:
Fix SearchableSnapshotDirectoryTests.testClearCache

There is a small chance that the file deletion will run
on the searchable snapshot thread pool and not on the test
thread now that the cache is non-blocking in which case
we fail the assertion unless we wait for that thread.

timeline.body:
Gotta make sure to only terminate the pool after shutting down everything else, otherwise we might leak a file listener from an action that has a reference to the file never executing.
See https://gradle-enterprise.elastic.co/s/wccywnq4vwa7i/console-log?anchor=8057
